column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Finally got a chance to have lunch here after a couple of failed attempts during previous visits to Houston.....the biggest barrier to enjoying lunch here is the inability to find a parking spot!   Definitely an indicator of the quality of the products served.   The Cuban sandwich is outstanding
column2: like nothing I've ever had in Florida...a place that prides itself on Cuban sandwiches.   The Nutella cupcake is good but I think I'd pass on dessert next time in favor of the sandwiches and amazing bread!
